interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: CHEROO Heated Eye Mask, Weighted Eye Compress with Natural Flaxseed & Adjustable Strap, Moist Heat for Men Women Dry Eyes, Blepharitis, Stye & Puffy Eyes (blue)
Review Date: 2021/03/04
Store: CHEROO
Average Rating: 3.9
Product Details: {'Brand': 'CHEROO', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 2.4 x 1.73 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'eyeBLUE-S', 'UPC': '782125484506', 'Manufacturer': 'CHEROO'}
Review Text: This mask has three heat and time settings. The cord is long enough that I was able to plug it in right by my bed. I used it when I came home from a red eye flight and the term “red eye” has never been more appropriate. My eyes felt like sandpaper. I used it on the highest heat setting and it really does get very warm but not uncomfortably so. I set it for 15 mins and fell asleep with it on.  I’ve used it a few times since and it makes me feel so relaxed and soothes my eyes and reduces redness and puffiness.
Review Title: Wonderfully relaxing.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
[Weekly Point Cosmetic Rose edition mask sheet] - Facial skin care mask sheet 3solutions(Wriklecare, Brighten up, Moisture) in one (1Pack of 10pcs) Weekly Point Cosmetic {'Brand': 'Weekly Point Cosmetic', 'Item Form': 'Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisture,Skin', 'Scent': 'Rose', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.38 x 4.84 x 7.01 inches; 12.63 Ounces'} I’ve been using sheet masks for years. Long before they became something you could buy at your local pharmacy so I’m used to reading the adorable translations on the back (see photo)

That aside the mask is a little on the small side and I think I have an average sized face. It does stretch though and the benefit is that it doesn’t get in your hair. Lots of serum with this one, or mask juice as I like to call it
so at the end of the mask time you have enough to apply extra to your face a neck.

I left it for the full 20 minutes and my skin did feel soft and moisturised. I used it after a transatlantic flight and my skin really needed the hydration. Obviously you won’t see any miracles after one use but do make it part of your weekly or twice weekly routine for maximum effect.

Don’t be tempted to leave it on longer or sleep with it. All masks will just dry out and negate the benefits.

This is a nice addition to my sheet mask collection. Lovely and hydrating. Glass Nail File - JORLAI 2PC Nano Nail Shiner Nail Files Polisher Glass Nail Buffers Professional Crystal Manicure Tools Kit for Natural Nails JORLAI {'Package Dimensions': '4.2 x 2.5 x 0.4 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '712322500167'} These are very cute and sparkly and come in their own case. I like that they’re nice and small and the thickness is great for shaping the sides of your nails. I found the buffing part slow going and it took quite a while to build up a shine but I’m happy with the end result. My nails took a real beating from gel so I’m giving them a break from all polish and this really helps build a lovely shine. Gives a good natural shine Travel Friendly Face Cleanser, Quick Cleansing Dry Tissue 20 Packs - Dry Facial Wipes Makeup Remover Travel Size, Exfoliating Wipes For Face a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar {'Brand': 'a DAILY SELF-CARE COSMETICS avajar', 'Skin Type': 'All Skin,Dry', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '20.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '20', 'Product Dimensions': '5.51 x 2.76 x 3.94 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This is a solid five stars. I'm a flight attendant and it's such a pain to have to take a variety of products when you travel and some countries have liquid restrictions.

I used this as soon as I got to my hotel with low expectations that were quickly blown away. You use wet it with warm water and it takes off all makeup including mascara. You rinse with water afterwards but it's not overly soapy so you don't have to worry about getting soap in your eyes. I've used this at home and then used a cotton wool pad with my usual makeup remover expecting some residue makeup but nothing was left. I'm so impressed with these and as one pad will take off all your makeup it's really good value. Sensational Bodipure Baking Soda Natural Vegetable Sport Bar Soap 3 Pack - Refreshing & Cooling Mint - Deodorizing Cleanser for Face and Body - 4 oz. ea Bodipure {'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'All, Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Bodipure', 'Scent': 'Clean, natural mint', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Dimensions': '7 x 2.25 x 1 inches; 14.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '838347004388', 'Manufacturer': 'Bodipure, Inc.'} The best soap I’ve used bar none. Seriously.

I came in from the garden where I’d been stacking a cord of firewood and planting bulbs. My hands were filthy and cracked. This soap made the dirt dissolve immediately. I know that’s what soap does but with this it just vanishes without even having to scrub, even from under my nails. It has a light mint scent and isn’t drying at all. I didn’t know I could get that excited about washing my hands. I tried it in the shower and my skin felt clean and smooth without feeling dry. Even my husband who doesn’t like anything remotely “girly” was a fan.

The hand mask that came with it was lovely and moisturising. The best soap I’ve used. Karuna 7 Days of Glow - Face & Eye Mask Variety Pack (7 Sheets), Hydrate, Brighten and Glow Karuna {'Package Dimensions': '7.05 x 5.04 x 1.57 inches; 8.75 Ounces', 'UPC': '857950007333'} This is a really great sheet mask pack. It hits all your skincare needs. These are the cloth style masks which I always find have more serum, better sticking power and a better fit than the hydrogel masks.

The eye patches I especially liked. They're packed full of serum, stay on well and cover the whole under eye and side area. The brightening face mask did seem to make my skin more even and brighter but it does say not for sensitive skin. I do sometimes have some sensitivity issues but didn't experience that with any of the masks.

There's enough serum in all the masks that you can use the excess the next day as a serum or swipe over your décolletage. I like to keep my masks in the fridge. They feel great when they're chilled. This is definitely a product I'll be buying again. great selection. Anon Make Up Remover Wipes 10ct | Individually Wrapped Natural Vitamin E and Aloe Vera | Bamboo Mini Makeup Wipes | AirBnB’s Choice for Convenient Single Use Face Wipes | Paraben and Alcohol Free Oil Slick {'Brand': 'Oil Slick', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Unit Count': '10.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'UPC': '760354449145'} I'm a flight attendant and love using makeup wipes on the road as it's so much easier than carting around lotions and potions. Sadly the wipes I got were quite dry and as such really didn't do much to remove my makeup. I had to use about five to make a dent in it and I really don't wear too much makeup other than a bit of concealer and CC cream. That said they don't have any sort of strong scent and didn't cause any irritation. I'd use them to freshen up my skin but I'll to pass on using them as a makeup wipe. Note: if you are using them to remove makeup it does say to rinse your skin with water afterwards. Not effective at removing makeup but a good fresher upper CHEROO Heated Eye Mask, Weighted Eye Compress with Natural Flaxseed & Adjustable Strap, Moist Heat for Men Women Dry Eyes, Blepharitis, Stye & Puffy Eyes (blue) CHEROO {'Brand': 'CHEROO', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Special Feature': 'Adjustable', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 2.4 x 1.73 inches; 4.66 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'eyeBLUE-S', 'UPC': '782125484506', 'Manufacturer': 'CHEROO'} This mask has three heat and time settings. The cord is long enough that I was able to plug it in right by my bed. I used it when I came home from a red eye flight and the term “red eye” has never been more appropriate. My eyes felt like sandpaper. I used it on the highest heat setting and it really does get very warm but not uncomfortably so. I set it for 15 mins and fell asleep with it on. I’ve used it a few times since and it makes me feel so relaxed and soothes my eyes and reduces redness and puffiness. Wonderfully relaxing.
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Skincare and Body Care Enthusiast:** Passionate about skincare, the user focuses on sheet masks, hydrating routines, and effective cleansers that nourish the skin.
- **Hydration Focus:** Prioritizes moisture and hydration, particularly post-travel, favoring restorative and non-drying products.
- **Routine-Oriented:** Maintains a consistent regimen, integrating various skincare and body care elements, including effective cleansing routines and soothing treatments.
- **Quality Over Quantity:** Values sustainable outcomes over quick fixes, demonstrating patience in their personal care journey.
- **Sensory Preferences:** Enjoys pleasant scents and delightful sensory experiences, favoring natural and refreshing aromas without strong fragrances.
- **User-Friendly Products:** Prefers easy-to-use items that seamlessly integrate into their routine.
- **Value for Money:** Seeks products that maximize benefits, ensuring effectiveness with each application.
- **Analytical Reviewer:** Engages in thoughtful, detailed feedback on product performance, showcasing a desire for high-quality items.
- **Nail Care Interest:** Actively explores nail care, favoring tools that enhance the natural appearance and functionality of nails.
- **Travel Considerations:** Interested in travel-friendly products, especially those that alleviate discomfort after long flights and simplify skincare management.
- **Effective Cleansing Preference:** Recently reaffirmed the importance of reliable cleansing products, noting the need for better performance and moisture retention.
- **Wellness and Relaxation:** Now also values supportive products that promote relaxation and relief from discomfort, particularly after travel, leading to enhanced overall wellbeing.
